resources.string: The app has been hidden. To open it again please dial 8722227 (TRACCAR).
Please enter a valid http:// or https:// URL
To continuously collect location data please turn off battery optimization for the app.
To continuously collect location data please enable \"%s\" permission.

Terms and Conditions - Android Mobile Tracking App
These terms and conditions ("Agreement") govern your use of the Android mobile tracking app ("App") provided by FREIGHTKING INDIA LIMITED ("Provider"), a company based in Mumbai, India. By installing and using the App, you agree to be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree with any part of these terms and conditions, please refrain from using the App.
1. App Functionality The App allows you to track the location and collect data from the Android devices on which it is installed. The data collected may include GPS coordinates, device information, and other relevant data necessary for providing the tracking functionality.
2. Data Collection and Usage The App collects and transmits data from the user\'s Android device to our secure server. This data includes the information provided by the user in the form within the App, such as driver name, driver mobile number, transport company name, consignment/courier details, parcel number, etc. We will handle the collected data in accordance with our privacy policy, which you can review [link to privacy policy].
3. User Consent By installing and using the App, you confirm that you have obtained the necessary consent from the device user to track their location and collect the provided data. It is your responsibility to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations regarding data privacy and obtaining user consent.
4. Data Security We take data security seriously and employ industry-standard measures to protect the data transmitted from the App to our server. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data but will make reasonable efforts to protect it.
5. Third-Party Services The App may integrate with third-party services, such as mapping services or analytics tools, to enhance its functionality. These third-party services may have their own terms and privacy policies, and your use of such services is subject to those terms and policies. We are not responsible for the actions or practices of these third-party services.
6. User Obligations You agree to use the App in compliance with all applicable laws, regulations, and this Agreement. You shall ensure that the information provided in the form is accurate and up to date. You shall not use the App for any illegal, unauthorized, or malicious purposes. You are solely responsible for the use and interpretation of the data collected through the App.
7. Disclaimer of Liability FREIGHTKING INDIA LIMITED shall not be liable for any damages, losses, or liabilities arising out of or in connection with the use of the App or the data collected. FREIGHTKING INDIA LIMITED disclaims any warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, reliability, or suitability of the App for any particular purpose.
8. Termination FREIGHTKING INDIA LIMITED reserves the right to terminate your access to the App at any time for any reason, without prior notice. Upon termination, you shall cease all use of the App and delete it from any devices under your control.
9. Updates and Modifications FREIGHTKING INDIA LIMITED may release updates or new versions of the App from time to time, which may include bug fixes, feature enhancements, or changes to the functionality. You agree to install and use the latest version of the App to ensure optimal performance and security.
10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be brought in the courts of Mumbai, Maharashtra, India.
11. Entire Agreement This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between you and FREIGHTKING INDIA LIMITED concerning the subject matter herein and supersedes all prior agreements and understandings, whether written or oral.
By installing and using the App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement. If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Agreement, please contact us at Info@freightking.in \n Mob:- +919324181883, Ph no:- 022 46007009.\n
FREIGHTKING INDIA LIMITED
Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
